title: Who Was Swag Guy?
body:
Went to MSI and it was a blast!

One itching question remains however: who was swag guy? The people must know!

replies.body: Swag guy talked to me as I left on day 1, laughing about how I was featured a ton during the interviews (I was right over Sjokz' shoulder). His hype game is too good.
Who doesn't love Swag Guy? His name is CB and you can follow him on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/cbmullz

Obviously {{champion:266}}  because he had {{summoner:14}}  and {{summoner:32}}  to kill all de lil {{summoner:30}}  but then he kicked my brudda in the ass.
1. Hotshot {{champion:76}}  GG
